# tf.keras.backend.l2_normalize


<table class="tfo-notebook-buttons tfo-api" align="left">

<td>
  <a target="_blank" href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/backend/l2_normalize">

Normalizes a tensor wrt the L2 norm alongside the specified axis.

### Aliases:

* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/backend/l2_normalize"><code>tf.compat.v1.keras.backend.l2_normalize</code></a>
* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/backend/l2_normalize"><code>tf.compat.v2.keras.backend.l2_normalize</code></a>


``` python
tf.keras.backend.l2_normalize(
    x,
    axis=None
)
```



<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


#### Arguments:


* <b>`x`</b>: Tensor or variable.
* <b>`axis`</b>: axis along which to perform normalization.


#### Returns:

A tensor.
